data.name: Write DEBUG.txt with detailed runtime information. Saved to settings.ini for future sessions.
data.value: Write DEBUG.txt with detailed runtime information. Saved to settings.ini for future sessions.

data.name: FrameHistory help
data.value:
For each non-idle frame, display a column of rectangles with info about it.
For each player : = The first row displays player state. - Startup->green - Active->red - Recovery->blue - Blockstun->yellow - Hitstun->purple - Hard landing recovery->blush - Special: hard to classify states(e.g.dashes)->Aquamarine
= Second row is for invul/armor. The position of the line segments indicates the attributes, and its color if invul or armor: - Invul->white - Armor->brown - H->top segment - B->middle segment - F->bottom segment - T->left segment - P->right segment

data.name: FrameHistory auto reset help
data.value: block auto-reset on an idle frame: Do not overwrite automatically after an idle frame.

data.name: Auto Reset##Reset after each idle frame
data.value: Auto Reset##Reset after each idle frame

data.name: The point in space where your character resides. Important!: This is a single point, the render is composed of two lines to facilitate viewing, the actual point is where the two lines touch.
data.value: The point in space where your character resides. Important!: This is a single point, the render is composed of two lines to facilitate viewing, the actual point is where the two lines touch.

data.name: Defines collision between objects/characters. Also used for throw range checks.
data.value: Defines collision between objects/characters. Also used for throw range checks.

data.name: Throw range help
data.value:
Throw Range Box(yellow): All throws require the throw range check. In order to pass this check the throw range box must overlap target's collision box.
Move Range Box(green): All throws and some moves require the move range check. In order to pass this check the move range box must overlap the target's origin point.
How do throws connect?
In order for a throw to connect you must have satisfy the following conditions: 1: Both players must be on the ground or in the air. This is decided by their origin position, not sprite. 2: You must pass the move range check. 3: You must pass the throw range check. 4: The hitbox of the throw must overlap the hurtbox of the target. 5: The target must not be throw immune.
